Description:
Detects successful code compilation via Visual Basic Command Line Compiler that utilizes Windows Resource to Object Converter.

Author: Ensar Åžamil, @sblmsrsn, @oscd_initiative
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Visual Basic Command Line Compiler Usage
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where parent_process_path like '%\vbc.exe' and process_path like '%\cvtres.exe'
